title: Avengers: Endgame
desc: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers assemble once more.

title: The Batman
desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a killer leaves cryptic clues.

title: Dune
desc: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
desc: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help when his identity is revealed to the world.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
desc: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet Pandora.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
desc: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
desc: Doctor Strange teams up with new and old allies to confront a mysterious new adversary.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
desc: Thor attempts to find inner peace but must return to action to stop Gorr the God Butcher.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
desc: The Guardians band together to defend the universe and protect one of their own.

title: Eternals
desc: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who have secretly lived on Earth for thousands of years.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
desc: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

title: Captain Marvel
desc: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes.

title: Iron Man
desc: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: Iron Man 2
desc: With the world aware of his alter ego, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful madman.

title: Iron Man 3
desc: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
desc: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
desc: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and battles a new threat from old history.

title: Captain America: Civil War
desc: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos.

title: Ant-Man
desc: Armed with a super-suit, Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero to help his mentor plan and pull off a heist.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
desc: As Scott Lang balances being a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission.

title: Doctor Strange
desc: A former neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing, only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: Black Widow
desc: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy arises.

title: The Incredible Hulk
desc: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run, searches for a cure to his condition that turns him into the Hulk.

title: The Avengers
desc: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
desc: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program, things go terribly wrong.

title: Deadpool
desc: A former special forces operative turned mercenary undergoes an experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

title: Deadpool 2
desc: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson brings together a team to protect a young boy from a time-traveling soldier.

title: Logan
desc: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an aging Wolverine and ailing Professor X defend a young mutant.

title: Venom
desc: A failed reporter bonds with an alien symbiote, giving him superhuman abilities.

title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
desc: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career while struggling to coexist with the alien symbiote.

title: Morbius
desc: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism.

title: The Marvels
desc: Carol Danvers, Monica Rambeau, and Kamala Khan team up when their powers become entangled.

title: Hawkeye
desc: Clint Barton teams up with a young archer to confront enemies from his past.

title: Moon Knight
desc: A former Marine struggling with dissociative identity disorder is granted powers by an Egyptian god.
